overview:
Darren is a Social Media Enthusiast with a main focus on increasing Search Engine Marketing (SEM) & Pay Per Click (PPC) productivity, raising Return On Ad Spend (ROAS), achieving better results and increasing the quality and relevancy of Search Engine Marketing (SEM) & Pay-Per-Click (PPC) campaigns.

Darren Specializes in the following: Google AdWords Professional, Yahoo! Local Ambassador, Microsoft adCenter, Search Engine Marketing, SEM, Pay Per Click, PPC, On Site SEO, Social Media Development and Management, Business Development, Media Planning, MSOffice, HTML, Adobe Product Suite
